import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { collection, doc, getDoc } from "firebase/firestore"; import { db } from './firebase-config'; const Crud = () => { const [tasks, setTasks] = useState([]); const docRef = doc(db, "cities", "SF"); const docSnap = getDoc(docRef); console.log(docSnap.data); console.log(tasks); return( <> <>

) } export default Crud;
